name: Virtual Earth Online
summary:
Imagine a game like Minecraft but multiplayer and the size of Earth. Virtual Earth Online uses Google Earth technology to recreate the entire Earth within the game. Your house is in this game! Every river, road, tree is here. Build cities and teleport around the world to your friend’s creations. We have a huge variety of materials that enable you to create anything you want to create. 
Virtual Earth Online is multiplayer over the internet. Use blocks and other building materials to build houses, farms or cities.
